name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass.
measurements: 4cl Vodka, 1.5cl Cointreau (Triple Sec), 4cl Cranberry Juice, 1cl Lime

name: El Diablo
instructions: Add all ingredients except Ginger Ale in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. Fill the glass with icecubes and top it up with Ginger Ale
measurements: 3cl Tequila, 2cl Creme de Cassis, 3cl Lime, 2cl Sugar, Ginger ale

name: Margharita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: Tommy's Margharita
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. Fill the glass with a big icecube if possible, otherwise regular icecubes

name: Gin Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass.
garnish: Bitters, Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Add all ingredients except Soda Water in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass, top with Soda Water.

name: White Lady
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
measurements: 4cl Gin, 1.5cl Cointreau (Triple Sec), 3cl Lemon, 2cl Sugar, 1cl Eggwhite
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Pink Lady
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
measurements: 4cl Gin, 1.5cl Cointreau (Triple Sec), 3cl Lemon, 2cl Grenadine, 1cl Eggwhite
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Aviation
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 3cl Gin, 1cl Maraschino Liquer, 1cl Violet Liquer, 3cl Lemon, 1cl Sugar

name: Clover Club
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass. PS. Can change the Raspberry Sugar to Raspberry Liquer if available

name: Negroni
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass with a big icecube

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place a sugarcube in the glass, add Angostura Bitters and then mash the cube. Add Whiskey and stir it with ice. Strain it into desired glass with a big icecube
measurements: 5cl Bourbon Whiskey, 3 Dash Angostura Bitters, 1 Sugarcube

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass

name: Vodka Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass

name: Vodka Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
garnish: Bitters, Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
garnish: Bitters, Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
garnish: Bitters, Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
instructions: Add all ingredients except Soda Water in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. Fill up the glass with icecubes and top with Soda Water
measurements: 4cl Bourbon Whiskey, 1,5cl Cointreau (Triple Sec), 3cl Lemon 2cl Sugar, Soda Water

name: Penicilin
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass with big icecube

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Add the Whiskey, Brown Sugar and Coffee to a glass, stir it and then top with Cream
measurements: 5cl Irish Whiskey, Coffee, Teaspoon Brown Sugar, Cream

name: Kaffe Karlsson
instructions: Add the spirits and coffee to a glass, top with Cream

name: Spanish Coffee
instructions: Add the spirit and coffee to a glass, top with Cream

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: White Russian
instructions: Add the spirits to the desired glass with icecubes, top with milk and stir

name: Black Russian
instructions: Add the spirits to the desired glass with icecubes or a big icecube

name: Colorado Bulldog
instructions: Add the spirits to the desired glass with icecubes, fill up with Coca Cola and top with Cream

name: Bramble
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass, fill the glass with crushed ice
measurements: 3cl Gin, 2cl Creme de Mûre, 3cl Lemon, 2cl Sugar

name: Last Word
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 2cl Gin, 2cl Green Chartreusse, 2cl Maraschino Liquer, 3cl Lime

name: Final Ward
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 2cl Rye Whiskey, 2cl Green Chartreusse, 2cl Maraschino Liquer, 3cl Lemon

name: Daquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: Dark & Stormy
instructions: Add all ingredients except Soda Water in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass, top with Soda Water. PS. Can top with Ginger Beer if you don't have Ginger Juice
measurements: 5cl Dark Rum, 3cl Lime, 2cl Sugar, 1cl Ginger Juice

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Add all ingredients except Soda Water in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass with ice cubes, top with soda water
measurements: 5cl Gin, 3cl Lemon, 2cl Sugar, 1cl Eggwhite, Soda Water
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Manhattan
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass
measurements: 4cl Bourbon Whiskey, 2cl Sweet Vermouth, 3 Dash Angostura Bitters

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: Add the spirits to the desired glass with icecubes, flll it up with equal parts of the juices
measurements: 2.5cl Vodka, 2.5cl Peach Liquer, Orange Juice, Cranberry Juice
garnish: Orange Wedge or Zest, Maraschino Berry

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass
garnish: Bitters, Lime Zest or none at all

name: Between the Sheets
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 2cl White Rum, 2cl Cognac, 2cl Cointreau(Triple Sec), 2cl Lemon, 1cl Sugar

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Add all ingredients to the Copper Mug, fill it up with crushed ice or icecubes, top it up with Ginger Beer

name: Pornstar Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients except Sparkling Wine in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass, fill up a shot glass with Sparkling Wine to serve on the side
measurements: 4cl Vanilla Vodka, 2cl Passionfruit Liquer, Shot of Sparkling Wine, 3cl Lime, 2cl Sugar

name: Sidecar
instructions: Rim half the glass with sugar.Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: French 75
instructions: Add all ingredients except Sparkling Wine in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. Top with Sparkling Wine
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Godfather
instructions: Add the spirits to the desried glass, add a big icecube or regular icecubes, thereafter stir the glass

name: Godmother
instructions: Add the spirits to the desried glass, add a big icecube or regular icecubes, thereafter stir the glass

name: Orgasm
instructions: Add the spirits to the desried glass, add a big icecube regular icecubes, thereafter stir the glass

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass with a big icecube

name: Americano
instructions: Add all ingredients except Soda Water to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass with a big icecube , top with Soda Water

name: Sbagliato
instructions: Add all ingredients except Sparkling Wine to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass with a big icecube , top with Sparkling Wine

name: Old Cuban
instructions: Add all ingredients except Sparkling Wine in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass, top with Sparkling Wine.
measurements: 4cl Dark Rum, Sparkling Wine, 2cl Lime, 1cl Sugar, Mint Leaves

name: Southside
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: Piña Colada
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. Fill up with icecubes
measurements: 5cl White Rum, 8cl Pineapple Juice, 3cl Coconut Cream, 1cl Lime
garnish: Lime Zest, Pineapple wedge, Maraschino Berry

name: Pink Panther
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up wth icecubes and milk, then top with Grenadine and stir

name: After Eight
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up wth icecubes and milk, then stir

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 2.5cl Creme de Cacao, 2.5cl Creme de Menthe, 3cl Cream

name: Strawberry Daquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. If you want it Frozen, add all ingredients and ice to a blender, mix it to a slush and pour in desired glass
measurements: 5cl White Rum, 3cl Lime Juice, 2cl Strawberry Sugar

name: Long Island Ice Tea
instructions: Add all ingredients to the desried glass, fill it up with icecubes and Coca Cola
measurements: 2cl Gin, 2cl Vodka, 2cl White Rum, 2cl Tequila, 2cl Cointreau (Triple Sec), 2cl Lemon, 1cl Sugar, Coca Cola

name: Hemingway Daquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 3cl White Rum, 2cl Maraschino Liquer, 2cl Lime, 3cl Grapefruit Juice

name: Paloma
instructions: Rim the glass with salt. Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Add all ingredient to the desired glass, fill it up with crushed ice. PS. Can add brown sugar to make it a little sweeter

name: Capiroska
instructions: Add all ingredient to the desired glass, fill it up with crushed ice. PS. Can add brown sugar to make it a little sweeter

name: Hugo
instructions: Add the spirit and Mint Leaves to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and Sparkling Wine, top it with Soda Water
measurements: 4cl Elderflower Liquer, Sparkling Wine, Soda Water, Mint Leaves

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and Sparkling Wine, top it with Soda Water
measurements: 4cl Aperol, Sparkling Wine, Soda Water, Mint Leaves

name: New York Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients exceot Red Wine in the shaker, first dry shake it without ice, add ice and shake it again. Pour into desired glass, pour the Red Wine on a spoon to layer it on the top
measurements: 5cl Bourbon Whiskey, 1cl Red Wine, 3cl Lemon, 2cl Sugar, 1cl Eggwhite

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Add all ingredients to the Copper Mug, fill it up with crushed ice or icecubes

name: Mojito
instructions: Add all ingredient to the desired glass, flatten the Mint Leaves in your hand first to open their pores. Fill the glass with crushed ice and top with Soda Water
measurements: 5cl White Rum, 3cl Lime, 2cl Sugar, Mint Leaves, Sodawater

name: Kir Royale
instructions: Pour the spirit into the desired glass, fill it up with Sparkling Whine
garnish: Lemon Zest or none at all

name: Gimlet
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass. This drink can be done with Lime Cordial instead of regular sugar and Lime Juice, which is a sugar that is infused with Lime Zest

name: Pimms Cup
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and top with Ginger Ale
garnish: Apple Slice, Cucumber, Orange Wedge, Strawberries

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and top with Orange Juice

name: Sazerac
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass
measurements: 4cl Cognac, 1cl Absinthe, 3 Dash Angostura Bitters, 1 Sugar Cube
garnish: Orange Zest or none at all

name: Martinez
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass
measurements: 2cl Gin, 2cl Sweet Vermouth, 2cl Maraschino Liquer, 3 Dash Orange Bitters
garnish: Orange Zest or none at all

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Add all ingredients to the desired glass, fill it up with ice and stir. PS. Add Tabasco, Worchestershire Sauce and Black Pepper according to your own preference, can have regular salt instead of Celery salt

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass with big icecube
measurements: 2cl White Rum, 2cl Dark Rum, 1cl Cointreau (Triple Sec)

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour the puré in the desired glass, fill it up with Sparkling Wine

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour Sparkling Wine in the desired glass, fill it up with Orange Juice after preference

name: Vesper Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass

name: Appletini
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and Orange Juice, pour the Grenadine on top and stir

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Add the spirit to the desired glass, fill it up with icecubes and Orange Juice

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass with a big icecube

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Add all ingredients in the shaker, shake it with ice and strain into desired glass
measurements: 4 cl Cognac, 1.5cl Creme de Cacao, 3cl Cream

name: Rob Roy
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass
measurements: 4cl Scotch Whiskey, 1.5cl Sweet Vermouth, 3 Dash Angostura Bitters

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir it and then pour into desired glass
